Infectra



*Infectra follows Deemos and his group*

  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, Aug=
ust 23, 2000 4:45 AM
  Subject: The un-named group...


  Deemos laughs.

 =
 "Don't worry Infectra, with you with us, we have 9, that combined with the=
 other Maximals and the Preds and Alliance will fall!" Deemos said.

  "We =
have no Maximal leader, Deemos." Blender said.

  "Maybe I should run for l=
eader if there isn't a leader." Deemos said. (He doesn't know aboutIron Rap=
tor) He thought about the mission.

  "Let's go!" Deemos said. He walks tow=
ard the Predacon base. His group of 7, still un-named, follow him...
    --=
--- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 2:04 AM
    Subject: Re: Airbo=
mber...


    Infectra



    *Infectra looks at Airbomber*


    Infectra:=
 "I'm afraid I'm going to get slagged just like that. and no one get mad. I=
'm not doubting any of you. But, there is a chance we could end up out numb=
ered tough. You probably think I'm being silly and dumb."


    *Infectra s=
ays to Airbomber*

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE =

      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 1:05 =
AM
      Subject: Airbomber...


      Airbomber seen the fear in Infectra'=
s eyes.

      "Why are you afraid?" Airbomber asked her...
        ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 12:25 AM
        Subjec=
t: Re: Doom Ice...


        Infectra


        *Infectra frowns. She reall=
y didn't know anything about this or what to do but her heart took gained f=
orce over her brain where she only thought about her love for Airbomber and=
 didn't want to lose him. She slowly walks over feeling a bit scared but ra=
ises her hands in air with the others but still felt scared*

          ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 12:05 AM
          Su=
bject: Doom Ice...


          A satsis pod falls in front of the Maximals =
base. At the same time, Deemos and his group are repaired and come from the=
 CR Chamber, their wounds were fatal but not major. The 6 of them sport a d=
ifferent paint job, all 6 of them are purple, black, and white now. Deemos =
and his group go outside and see the pod. Deemos gives the thumbs up to His=
 comrades. They start to program it.

          "Name?" Deemos asked.

    =
      "It says the name is...Tint." Rizopas says. Deemos's smile is huge.

=
          "Make the name Doom Ice, you can do that, if she was dumb enough =
to escape in a stasis pod, we reprogram her!" Deemos said.

          "Isn'=
t that what we are against?" Artist asked.

          "No, Artist, it's not=
, we are just trying to make more bots good!" Deemos replied. Airbomber wal=
ks up and sees the pod.

          "What are you guys doing with the pod?" =
He asked. Suddenly, every one of Deemos' group members had a blaster stuck =
in Airbomber's face.

          "I say we kill him!" Blender said.

       =
   "I say we make him join us in our fight!" Diskus said.

          "For o=
nce your intelligent, Diskus!" Stronghold said. Airbomber is sweating now, =
he didn't know what that meant but it scared him. Deemos came up from behin=
d him. (Don't know if Infectra is there, but I assume she is, if she's not =
then tell me) Stronghold and Blender target Infectra. Deemos starts to pump=
 some phony info into his mind with the device, and bam! He already looks s=
erious.

          "Infectra, you might as well leave." Deemos said.

     =
     "I will join you, you guys are right, we do need less violence, the wa=
r must end, and if there must be a war to end the war, so be it!" Airbomber=
 said. He turns back to Infectra.

          "Do not worry, Infectra, I sti=
ll love you, you don't have to leave." Airbomber said. Deemos laughed and r=
ubbed his hands together as Rizopas reprograms Tint and makes her Doom Ice.=
 Doom Ice is first seen now, she stands and looks around. Deemos is in a ne=
w form, but she reconizes him. But, she has no fear, he seems different. Sh=
e knew of their war, she didn't know how, but she knew. (Reprogrammed and m=
emory addage while she was asleep)

          "I shall join you." Doom Ice =
said. Deemos looked at his growing group, A few more and he'll rule the Neo=
 Beast Wars! It's a sure thing! He thought. He had 8 now, and it felt prett=
y good. Doom Ice didn't remember Land Mine a single bit, and remembered Dee=
mos as your lord and almighty leader.

          "For the Maximals, and eve=
ryone's protection and peace! Until all...are one!" Deemos shouted. Doom Ic=
e and Airbomber's hands were raised and the 8 of them raised their hands hi=
gh in the air. Airbomber waved for Infectra to do it to, not caring about w=
hat she thought of this group...
